abstract: Rafael Márquez Álvarez (locally: [rafaˈel markes ˈalβaɾes]; born 13 February 1979), also referred to as Rafa, is a Mexican footballer currently playing for Club León of the Liga MX and the Mexico national team. He plays as a central defender or defensive midfielder.Márquez spent over a decade playing in Europe, winning numerous titles with AS Monaco and Barcelona. In 2006 he became the first Mexican player to win the UEFA Champions League when Barcelona defeated Arsenal.
